TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit TaskPaneCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.IEnumerable
Public MustInherit Class TaskPaneCollection Implements IEnumerable
public ref class TaskPaneCollection abstract : System::Collections::IEnumerable

Docs.summary: Contains a collection of objects that represent the task panes associated with a window in Microsoft InfoPath.

remarks.para: The TaskPaneCollection class provides properties that can be used to access TaskPane objects, and it is accessed through the property of the class.

Note: The TaskPaneCollection class can be used only to get the count of the TaskPane objects that it contains and to return a reference to a specified TaskPane object. It cannot be used to add or remove TaskPane objects.

example.para: The following example sets a reference to the TaskPane object in the TaskPaneCollection with the value of 1, which corresponds to the Clip Art task pane, and then displays the task pane.
example.code: Dim myTaskPane As TaskPane = Me.TaskPanes(1) myTaskPane.Visible = true
example.para: Alternatively, you can reference a TaskPane object in the TaskPaneCollection by using a value, as shown in the following example.
example.code: Dim myTaskPane As TaskPane = Me.TaskPanes(TaskPaneType.ClipArt) myTaskPane.Visible = true

This type or member can be accessed only from code running in forms opened in Microsoft InfoPath Filler.
